entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 1:55 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.1°C
Pressure: 99.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: W 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or snow changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:34 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:34 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:34 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
